comments.body: What rate limits are there on this API? Any account-wide ones will cause inconsistent failures if many playbooks are run at once. On the AWS modules we have common exponential-backoff code that handles this, and the base class could be extended for GCP.

I haven't been able to find a good answer for the rate limits on this API. I'm not worried about the potential for it to fail though. We can do some kind of exponential-backoff, but I'm thinking that might be better as an additional feature later on
